text: Patient, helpful and do not charge for small items or maintenance. Always go back to them for spectacle or other lens purchase.
They are very patient and helpful. Prices are good and they also took the time and care to give me a full eye check for corneal scratches when I mentioned certain symptoms.

Super friendly and patient with me & my hubs when we were choosing our spectacles. We bought 2 specs from them with Hoya lens. Enjoyed our purchases here that I brought in my old specs and changed my old lens to the Hoya lens with them for my 2nd purchase.
Very caring and dedicated people. Listens to your complaints patiently and recommends good glasses!!!‚ù§Ô∏èü§ó
Extremely friendly and helpful staff! Thanks for helping to fix my spectacle.
